Build an app for the android phone. The app is a simple calculator. It support add, subtract, multiply, divide functionality.
The user can input the number using button or keyboard of phone.

=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14ea586ac5d0>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> The mobile application is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album.
Product_manager (to chat_manager):

The mobile application is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album.

=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build a web site for job search.
It contain three basic function, search/edit/delete job.
User can create new job by click newbutton.
When user select a position and drag it to job. User can save the job into the database.
User can delete the job in the database by long press the job.app will show all jobs in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more job
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

Build a web site for job search.
It contain three basic function, search/edit/delete job.
User can create new job by click newbutton.
When user select a position and drag it to job. User can save the job into the database.
User can delete the job in the database by long press the job.app will show all jobs in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more job
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.

Business analyst (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job..

It contain three basic function, search/edit/delete job.
User can create new job by click newbutton.
When user select a position and drag it to job. User can save the job into the database.
User can delete the job in the database by long press the job.app will show all jobs in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more job
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14e5e937c710>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build a web site for job search.
It contain three basic function, search/edit/delete job.
User can create new job by click newbutton.
When user select a position and drag it to job. User can save the job into the database.
User can delete the job in the database by long press the job.app will show all jobs in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more job
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

Build a web site for job search.
It contain three basic function, search/edit/delete job.
User can create new job by click newbutton.
When user select a position and drag it to job. User can save the job into the database.
User can delete the job in the database by long press the job.app will show all jobs in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more job
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.

=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job..
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job..

=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job..
Product_manager (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job..

=======mingdebug====>after groupchat.py 366=>final= True |name= 
=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14e5e937c710>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The app is a photo album manager.\nIt contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.\nUser can create new album by click newbutton.\nWhen user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.\nUser can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.\nThe app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album\nAfter press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.\nThe user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.\nWhen click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.\nUser can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.\nThe app will support multiple images in one album.\nUser can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Business analyst'}

=======mingdebug====>after groupchat.py 366=>final= True |name= 
=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14e5e937c790>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
Product_manager (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=======mingdebug====>after groupchat.py 366=>final= True |name= 
=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14e5e937c710>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=======mingdebug====>after groupchat.py 366=>final= True |name= 
=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14e5e937c790>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
Product_manager (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=======mingdebug====>after groupchat.py 366=>final= True |name= 
The app will have a feature that allows users to add watermarks to their photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to adjust the brightness, contrast, and color balance of their photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to crop and resize their photos.
=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14e5e937c710>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to backup their photos to cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in 3D mode using augmented reality technology.
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to backup their photos to cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in 3D mode using augmented reality technology.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14e5e937c790>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to backup their photos to cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in 3D mode using augmented reality technology.
Product_manager (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to backup their photos to cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in 3D mode using augmented reality technology.

=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to backup their photos to cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in 3D mode using augmented reality technology.
The app will have a feature that allows users to add filters and effects to their photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to create photo albums with specific themes or occasions.
The app will have a feature that allows users to create slideshows of their photos with music and transitions.
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to backup their photos to cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in 3D mode using augmented reality technology.
The app will have a feature that allows users to add filters and effects to their photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to create photo albums with specific themes or occasions.
The app will have a feature that allows users to create slideshows of their photos with music and transitions.

=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=> Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to backup their photos to cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in 3D mode using augmented reality technology.
The app will have a feature that allows users to add filters and effects to their photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to create photo albums with specific themes or occasions.
The app will have a feature that allows users to create slideshows of their photos with music and transitions.
Product_manager (to chat_manager):

Build an app for iphone. The app is a photo album manager.
It contains three basic function, add/edit/delete photo.
User can create new album by click newbutton.
When user select an image and drag it to album. User can save the image into the album.
User can delete the album or image in the album by long press the album or image.
The app will show all albums in the phone. User can scroll down or up to view more album
After press enter key on the keyboard. The app will automatically search the result.
The user input the keyword, select the search range (all jobs, my jobs). Click search button get the search list of job.
When click a job from the search list. User can see detail information of this job.
User can edit the photo by long press on the image and select the editing options.
The app will support multiple images in one album.
User can share the album or individual photos via social media or email.
The app will allow users to add captions, tags, and comments to their photos.
The app will also have a feature that allows users to create collages from multiple photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in a grid or list view.
The app will have a feature that allows users to sort their photos by date, location, or other criteria.
The app will have a feature that allows users to set password protection for their albums and photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to backup their photos to cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
The app will have a feature that allows users to view their photos in 3D mode using augmented reality technology.
The app will have a feature that allows users to add filters and effects to their photos.
The app will have a feature that allows users to create photo albums with specific themes or occasions.
The app will have a feature that allows users to create slideshows of their photos with music and transitions.

=======mingdebug====>after groupchat.py 366=>final= True |name= 

Business analyst: Sure, I can help you with that. Let's start by breaking down the requirements into smaller components.

1. User Authentication and Authorization: The system should allow users to register and log in to the website. Users should be able to create their own accounts and passwords, and they should be able to log out of the system when they are finished. Additionally, the system should have a mechanism for verifying user identities, such as email addresses or phone numbers.
2. User registration and login functionality: The system should allow users to create new accounts by providing their name, email address, password, and any other relevant information. Users should be able to log in to the system using their email address and password.
3. Product Management: The system should allow administrators to manage products on the website. They should be able to add new products, edit existing products, and delete products from the website. Additionally, they should be able to view sales data for each product.
4. Shopping Cart: The system should allow users to add items to their shopping carts and remove items from their shopping carts. Users should be able to view the contents of their shopping carts and make changes to them.
5. Order Processing: The system should allow administrators to process orders that have been placed by customers. They should be able to view order details, such as the customer's name, email address, and shipping information. Additionally, they should be able to mark orders as shipped and update order statuses.
6. Search and Navigation: The system should allow users to search for products on the website using keywords or phrases. It should also have a navigation menu that allows users to easily find the products they are looking for.
7. Design document: The system should have a clear and concise design document that outlines the architecture, user interface, and functionality of the system. This will help ensure that everyone involved in the development process has a shared understanding of what the system is supposed to do.

Please let me know if you need any further clarification on these requirements.
=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14cfb87a8ad0>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=>  Requirements for a Web Shopping System:

1. User Authentication and Authorization:
* Users should be able to create an account by providing their name, email address, password, and billing information.
* Users should be able to log in using their email address and password.
* The system should have a secure login page with two-factor authentication (2FA) for added security.
* The system should have different roles for users such as admin, customer, and guest.
1. User Registration and Login Functionality:
* Users should be able to create an account by providing their name, email address, password, and billing information.
* Users should be able to log in using their email address and password.
* The system should have a secure login page with two-factor authentication (2FA) for added security.
* The system should have different roles for users such as admin, customer, and guest.
1. Product Management:
* The system should have a product management module that allows administrators to add, edit, delete, and manage products.
* The product management module should have features like product descriptions, images, pricing, and inventory management.
* The system should have a search feature that allows users to search for products by name, category, or keyword.
1. Shopping Cart:
* Users should be able to add items to their shopping cart and remove them as needed.
* The shopping cart should display the total cost of the items in the cart, including taxes and shipping fees.
* The system should have a feature that allows users to update the quantity of items in their shopping cart.
1. Order Processing:
* The system should have an order processing module that allows administrators to view, edit, and manage orders.
* The order processing module should have features like order status, payment processing, and shipping tracking.
* The system should have a feature that allows users to track their orders.
1. Search and Navigation:
* The system should have a search feature that allows users to search for products by name, category, or keyword.
* The system should have a navigation menu that allows users to easily browse products by category or subcategory.
* The system should have a breadcrumb trail that shows the user's location on the website and how they got there.
1. Design Document:
* The system should have a clean, modern design with a responsive layout that works well on different devices.
* The system should have a consistent color scheme and typography throughout the website.
* The system should have clear and concise content that is easy to read and understand.
* The system should have a secure connection (HTTPS) for added security.

1. User Authentication and Authorization:

Order Processing:\n* The system should have an order processing module that allows administrators to view, edit, and manage orders.\n* The order processing module should have features like order status, payment processing, and shipping tracking.\n* The system should have a feature that allows users to track their orders.\n1. Search and Navigation:\n* The system should have a search feature that allows users to search for products by name, category, or keyword.\n* The system should have a navigation menu that allows users to easily browse products by category or subcategory.\n* The system should have a breadcrumb trail that shows the user's location on the website and how they got there.\n1. Design Document:\n* The system should have a clean, modern design with a responsive layout that works well on different devices.\n* The system should have a consistent color scheme and typography throughout the website.\n* The system should have clear and concise content that is easy to read and understand.\n* The system should have a secure connection (HTTPS) for added security.", 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Business analyst'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': "Read the above conversation. Then select the next role from ['User_proxy', 'Business analyst', 'Product_manager'] to play. Only return the role."}]

=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=>  Additional Requirements:

1. Payment Processing:
* The system should have a payment processing module that allows users to make payments using popular payment gateways like PayPal, Stripe, or Braintree.
* The payment processing module should have features like secure payment processing, fraud detection, and chargeback protection.
* The system should have a feature that allows users to save their payment information for future purchases.
1. Customer Support:
* The system should have a customer support module that allows administrators to manage customer inquiries and support tickets.
* The customer support module should have features like ticket prioritization, ticket tracking, and response templates.
* The system should have a feature that allows customers to contact customer support through different channels like email, phone, or live chat.
1. Mobile Optimization:
* The system should be optimized for mobile devices with a responsive design that works well on smartphones and tablets.
* The mobile optimization should include features like touch-friendly navigation, fast loading times, and mobile-specific functionality like push notifications and location-based services.
1. Analytics and Reporting:
* The system should have an analytics and reporting module that allows administrators to track website performance, user behavior, and sales data.
* The analytics and reporting module should have features like real-time analytics, custom reports, and data visualization tools.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to set up goals and KPIs to measure the success of the website.

* The analytics and reporting module should have features like real-time analytics, custom reports, and data visualization tools.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to set up goals and KPIs to measure the success of the website.

Order Processing:\n* The system should have an order processing module that allows administrators to view, edit, and manage orders.\n* The order processing module should have features like order status, payment processing, and shipping tracking.\n* The system should have a feature that allows users to track their orders.\n1. Search and Navigation:\n* The system should have a search feature that allows users to search for products by name, category, or keyword.\n* The system should have a navigation menu that allows users to easily browse products by category or subcategory.\n* The system should have a breadcrumb trail that shows the user's location on the website and how they got there.\n1. Design Document:\n* The system should have a clean, modern design with a responsive layout that works well on different devices.\n* The system should have a consistent color scheme and typography throughout the website.\n* The system should have clear and concise content that is easy to read and understand.\n* The system should have a secure connection (HTTPS) for added security.", 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Business analyst'}, {'content': ' Additional Requirements:\n\n1. Payment Processing:\n* The system should have a payment processing module that allows users to make payments using popular payment gateways like PayPal, Stripe, or Braintree.\n* The payment processing module should have features like secure payment processing, fraud detection, and chargeback protection.\n* The system should have a feature that allows users to save their payment information for future purchases.\n1. Customer Support:\n* The system should have a customer support module that allows administrators to manage customer inquiries and support tickets.\n* The customer support module should have features like ticket prioritization, ticket tracking, and response templates.\n* The system should have a feature that allows customers to contact customer support through different channels like email, phone, or live chat.\n1. Mobile Optimization:\n* The system should be optimized for mobile devices with a responsive design that works well on smartphones and tablets.\n* The mobile optimization should include features like touch-friendly navigation, fast loading times, and mobile-specific functionality like push notifications and location-based services.\n1. Analytics and Reporting:\n* The system should have an analytics and reporting module that allows administrators to track website performance, user behavior, and sales data.\n* The analytics and reporting module should have features like real-time analytics, custom reports, and data visualization tools.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to set up goals and KPIs to measure the success of the website.', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Product_manager'}, {'content': '', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'User_proxy'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': "Read the above conversation. =======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=>  Additional Requirements:

1. Product Recommendation System:
* The system should have a product recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and preferences.
* The product recommendation system should use machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and provide personalized recommendations.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product recommendation system and customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Social Media Integration:
* The system should have social media integration that allows users to share products on their social media accounts and invite friends to the website.
* The social media integration should include features like sharing buttons, social media feeds, and social login options.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage social media integration and customize it for different social media platforms.
1. Multi-Language Support:
* The system should support multiple languages to cater to users from different regions and countries.
* The multi-language support should include features like language selection, translation tools, and localized content.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage multi-language support and customize it for different languages.
1. Accessibility:
* The system should be accessible to users with disabilities by complying with accessibility guidelines like WCAG 2.1.
* The accessibility features should include features like keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, and high contrast mode.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to test the website for accessibility and make necessary improvements.

=======mingdebug====>after groupchat.py 366=>final= True |name= 
=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14cfb75b08d0>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=>  Additional Requirements:

1. User Feedback and Rating System:
* The system should have a user feedback and rating system that allows users to rate products and leave reviews.
* The user feedback and rating system should be visible on product pages and allow administrators to moderate and respond to reviews.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to analyze user feedback and ratings to improve product quality and customer satisfaction.
1. Inventory Management:
* The system should have an inventory management module that allows administrators to manage product stock levels, reorder points, and suppliers.
* The inventory management module should have features like real-time inventory tracking, low stock alerts, and automated reordering.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to set up different inventory levels for different products or categories.
1. Content Management System:
* The system should have a content management system (CMS) that allows administrators to create and manage website content without requiring technical expertise.
* The CMS should have features like drag-and-drop editing, template customization, and media management.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to schedule and publish content in advance.
1. Customer Loyalty Program:
* The system should have a customer loyalty program that rewards users for repeat purchases or referrals.
* The customer loyalty program should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage rewards, redemptions, and points balances.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the loyalty program for different categories or subcategories of products.
Product_manager (to chat_manager):

 Additional Requirements:

1. User Feedback and Rating System:
* The system should have a user feedback and rating system that allows users to rate products and leave reviews.
* The user feedback and rating system should be visible on product pages and allow administrators to moderate and respond to reviews.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to analyze user feedback and ratings to improve product quality and customer satisfaction.
1. Inventory Management:
* The system should have an inventory management module that allows administrators to manage product stock levels, reorder points, and suppliers.
* The inventory management module should have features like real-time inventory tracking, low stock alerts, and automated reordering.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to set up different inventory levels for different products or categories.
1. Content Management System:
* The system should have a content management system (CMS) that allows administrators to create and manage website content without requiring technical expertise.
* The CMS should have features like drag-and-drop editing, template customization, and media management.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to schedule and publish content in advance.
1. Customer Loyalty Program:
* The system should have a customer loyalty program that rewards users for repeat purchases or referrals.
* The customer loyalty program should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage rewards, redemptions, and points balances.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the loyalty program for different categories or subcategories of products.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14cfb87a8ad0>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=>  Additional Requirements:

1. Payment Gateway Integration:
* The system should have payment gateway integration that allows users to make purchases securely and easily.
* The payment gateway integration should support multiple payment options like credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Wallet, etc.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage payment gateway settings and customize it for different regions or countries.
1. Shipping Calculator:
* The system should have a shipping calculator that allows users to calculate the cost of shipping based on their location and product selection.
* The shipping calculator should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage shipping rates and methods.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the shipping calculator for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Customer Service Chatbot:
* The system should have a customer service chatbot that provides instant support to users who need help with their purchases or orders.
* The customer service chatbot should be visible on the website and allow administrators to customize it for different regions or countries.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the chatbot's responses and escalate complex issues to human support agents.
1. SEO Optimization:
* The system should be optimized for search engines by complying with SEO best practices like keyword research, meta tags, sitemaps, etc.
* The SEO optimization should include features like keyword suggestions, content analysis, and backlink tracking.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to monitor and improve the website's search engine rankings and visibility.
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

 Additional Requirements:

1. Payment Gateway Integration:
* The system should have payment gateway integration that allows users to make purchases securely and easily.
* The payment gateway integration should support multiple payment options like credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Wallet, etc.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage payment gateway settings and customize it for different regions or countries.
1. Shipping Calculator:
* The system should have a shipping calculator that allows users to calculate the cost of shipping based on their location and product selection.
* The shipping calculator should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage shipping rates and methods.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the shipping calculator for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Customer Service Chatbot:
* The system should have a customer service chatbot that provides instant support to users who need help with their purchases or orders.
* The customer service chatbot should be visible on the website and allow administrators to customize it for different regions or countries.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the chatbot's responses and escalate complex issues to human support agents.
1. SEO Optimization:
* The system should be optimized for search engines by complying with SEO best practices like keyword research, meta tags, sitemaps, etc.
* The SEO optimization should include features like keyword suggestions, content analysis, and backlink tracking.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to monitor and improve the website's search engine rankings and visibility.

=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14cfb75b08d0>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=>  Additional Requirements:

1. Product Comparison Tool:
* The system should have a product comparison tool that allows users to compare different products side-by-side based on their features, specifications, and prices.
* The product comparison tool should be visible on the website and allow administrators to customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product comparison tool's data sources and update them regularly.
1. Product Recommendation Algorithm:
* The system should have a product recommendation algorithm that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and preferences.
* The product recommendation algorithm should use machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and provide personalized recommendations.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product recommendation algorithm's settings and customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Product Bundling:
* The system should have a product bundling feature that allows users to purchase multiple products at a discounted price.
* The product bundling feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the available bundles and their prices.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product bundling feature for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Product Reviews:
* The system should have a product review feature that allows users to leave feedback about their purchases and experiences with the website.
* The product review feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the reviews and ratings for each product.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product review feature's display settings and trigger points (e.g., after a purchase, after a certain number of days).
Product_manager (to chat_manager):

 Additional Requirements:

1. Product Comparison Tool:
* The system should have a product comparison tool that allows users to compare different products side-by-side based on their features, specifications, and prices.
* The product comparison tool should be visible on the website and allow administrators to customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product comparison tool's data sources and update them regularly.
1. Product Recommendation Algorithm:
* The system should have a product recommendation algorithm that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and preferences.
* The product recommendation algorithm should use machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and provide personalized recommendations.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product recommendation algorithm's settings and customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Product Bundling:
* The system should have a product bundling feature that allows users to purchase multiple products at a discounted price.
* The product bundling feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the available bundles and their prices.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product bundling feature for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Product Reviews:
* The system should have a product review feature that allows users to leave feedback about their purchases and experiences with the website.
* The product review feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the reviews and ratings for each product.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product review feature's display settings and trigger points (e.g., after a purchase, after a certain number of days).

Product Management:\n* The system should have a product management module that allows administrators to add, edit, delete, and manage products.\n* The product management module should have features like product descriptions, images, pricing, and inventory management.\n* The system should have a search feature that allows users to search for products by name, category, or keyword.\n1. Shopping Cart:\n* Users should be able to add items to their shopping cart and remove them as needed.\n* The shopping cart should display the total cost of the items in the cart, including taxes and shipping fees.\n* The system should have a feature that allows users to update the quantity of items in their shopping cart.\n1. Order Processing:\n* The system should have an order processing module that allows administrators to view, edit, and manage orders.\n* The order processing module should have features like order status, payment processing, and shipping tracking.\n* The system should have a feature that allows users to track their orders.\n1. Search and Navigation:\n* The system should have a search feature that allows users to search for products by name, category, or keyword.\n* The system should have a navigation menu that allows users to easily browse products by category or subcategory.\n* The system should have a breadcrumb trail that shows the user's location on the website and how they got there.\n1. Design Document:\n* The system should have a clean, modern design with a responsive layout that works well on different devices.\n* The system should have a consistent color scheme and typography throughout the website.\n* The system should have clear and concise content that is easy to read and understand.\n* The system should have a secure connection (HTTPS) for added security.", 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Business analyst'}, {'content': ' Additional Requirements:\n\n1. Payment Processing:\n* The system should have a payment processing module that allows users to make payments using popular payment gateways like PayPal, Stripe, or Braintree.\n* The payment processing module should have features like secure payment processing, fraud detection, and chargeback protection.\n* The system should have a feature that allows users to save their payment information for future purchases.\n1. Customer Support:\n* The system should have a customer support module that allows administrators to manage customer inquiries and support tickets.\n* The customer support module should have features like ticket prioritization, ticket tracking, and response templates.\n* The system should have a feature that allows customers to contact customer support through different channels like email, phone, or live chat.\n1. Mobile Optimization:\n* The system should be optimized for mobile devices with a responsive design that works well on smartphones and tablets.\n* The mobile optimization should include features like touch-friendly navigation, fast loading times, and mobile-specific functionality like push notifications and location-based services.\n1. Analytics and Reporting:\n* The system should have an analytics and reporting module that allows administrators to track website performance, user behavior, and sales data.\n* The analytics and reporting module should have features like real-time analytics, custom reports, and data visualization tools.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to set up goals and KPIs to measure the success of the website.', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Product_manager'}, {'content': '', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'User_proxy'}, {'content': ' Additional Requirements:\n\n1. Product Recommendation System:\n* The system should have a product recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and preferences.\n* The product recommendation system should use machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and provide personalized recommendations.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product recommendation system and customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.\n1. Social Media Integration:\n* The system should have social media integration that allows users to share products on their social media accounts and invite friends to the website.\n* The social media integration should include features like sharing buttons, social media feeds, and social login options.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage social media integration and customize it for different social media platforms.\n1. Multi-Language Support:\n* The system should support multiple languages to cater to users from different regions and countries.\n* The multi-language support should include features like language selection, translation tools, and localized content.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage multi-language support and customize it for different languages.\n1. Accessibility:\n* The system should be accessible to users with disabilities by complying with accessibility guidelines like WCAG 2.1.\n* The accessibility features should include features like keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, and high contrast mode.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to test the website for accessibility and make necessary improvements.', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Business analyst'}, {'content': ' Additional Requirements:\n\n1. User Feedback and Rating System:\n* The system should have a user feedback and rating system that allows users to rate products and leave reviews.\n* The user feedback and rating system should be visible on product pages and allow administrators to moderate and respond to reviews.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to analyze user feedback and ratings to improve product quality and customer satisfaction.\n1. Inventory Management:\n* The system should have an inventory management module that allows administrators to manage product stock levels, reorder points, and suppliers.\n* The inventory management module should have features like real-time inventory tracking, low stock alerts, and automated reordering.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to set up different inventory levels for different products or categories.\n1. Content Management System:\n* The system should have a content management system (CMS) that allows administrators to create and manage website content without requiring technical expertise.\n* The CMS should have features like drag-and-drop editing, template customization, and media management.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to schedule and publish content in advance.\n1. Customer Loyalty Program:\n* The system should have a customer loyalty program that rewards users for repeat purchases or referrals.\n* The customer loyalty program should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage rewards, redemptions, and points balances.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the loyalty program for different categories or subcategories of products.', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Product_manager'}, {'content': '', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'User_proxy'}, {'content': " Additional Requirements:\n\n1. Payment Gateway Integration:\n* The system should have payment gateway integration that allows users to make purchases securely and easily.\n* The payment gateway integration should support multiple payment options like credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Wallet, etc.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage payment gateway settings and customize it for different regions or countries.\n1. Shipping Calculator:\n* The system should have a shipping calculator that allows users to calculate the cost of shipping based on their location and product selection.\n* The shipping calculator should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage shipping rates and methods.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the shipping calculator for different categories or subcategories of products.\n1. Customer Service Chatbot:\n* The system should have a customer service chatbot that provides instant support to users who need help with their purchases or orders.\n* The customer service chatbot should be visible on the website and allow administrators to customize it for different regions or countries.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the chatbot's responses and escalate complex issues to human support agents.\n1. SEO Optimization:\n* The system should be optimized for search engines by complying with SEO best practices like keyword research, meta tags, sitemaps, etc.\n* The SEO optimization should include features like keyword suggestions, content analysis, and backlink tracking.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to monitor and improve the website's search engine rankings and visibility.", 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Business analyst'}, {'content': " Additional Requirements:\n\n1. Product Comparison Tool:\n* The system should have a product comparison tool that allows users to compare different products side-by-side based on their features, specifications, and prices.\n* The product comparison tool should be visible on the website and allow administrators to customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product comparison tool's data sources and update them regularly.\n1. Product Recommendation Algorithm:\n* The system should have a product recommendation algorithm that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and preferences.\n* The product recommendation algorithm should use machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and provide personalized recommendations.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product recommendation algorithm's settings and customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.\n1. Product Bundling:\n* The system should have a product bundling feature that allows users to purchase multiple products at a discounted price.\n* The product bundling feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the available bundles and their prices.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product bundling feature for different categories or subcategories of products.\n1. Search and Navigation:\n* The system should have a search feature that allows users to search for products by name, category, or keyword.\n* The system should have a navigation menu that allows users to easily browse products by category or subcategory.\n* The system should have a breadcrumb trail that shows the user's location on the website and how they got there.\n1. Design Document:\n* The system should have a clean, modern design with a responsive layout that works well on different devices.\n* The system should have a consistent color scheme and typography throughout the website.\n* The system should have clear and concise content that is easy to read and understand.\n* The system should have a secure connection (HTTPS) for added security.", 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Business analyst'}, {'content': ' Additional Requirements:\n\n1. Payment Processing:\n* The system should have a payment processing module that allows users to make payments using popular payment gateways like PayPal, Stripe, or Braintree.\n* The payment processing module should have features like secure payment processing, fraud detection, and chargeback protection.\n* The system should have a feature that allows users to save their payment information for future purchases.\n1. Customer Support:\n* The system should have a customer support module that allows administrators to manage customer inquiries and support tickets.\n* The customer support module should have features like ticket prioritization, ticket tracking, and response templates.\n* The system should have a feature that allows customers to contact customer support through different channels like email, phone, or live chat.\n1. Mobile Optimization:\n* The system should be optimized for mobile devices with a responsive design that works well on smartphones and tablets.\n* The mobile optimization should include features like touch-friendly navigation, fast loading times, and mobile-specific functionality like push notifications and location-based services.\n1. Analytics and Reporting:\n* The system should have an analytics and reporting module that allows administrators to track website performance, user behavior, and sales data.\n* The analytics and reporting module should have features like real-time analytics, custom reports, and data visualization tools.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to set up goals and KPIs to measure the success of the website.', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'Product_manager'}, {'content': '', 'role': 'user', 'name': 'User_proxy'}, {'content': ' Additional Requirements:\n\n1. Social Media Integration:\n* The system should have social media integration that allows users to share products on their social media accounts and invite friends to the website.\n* The social media integration should include features like sharing buttons, social media feeds, and social login options.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage social media integration and customize it for different social media platforms.\n1. Multi-Language Support:\n* The system should support multiple languages to cater to users from different regions and countries.\n* The multi-language support should include features like language selection, translation tools, and localized content.\n* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage multi-language support and customize it for different languages.\n1. =======mingdebug====>after groupchat.py 366=>final= True |name= 
=======mingdebug533====>speaker=> <autogen.agentchat.assistant_agent.AssistantAgent object at 0x14cfb87a8ad0>
=======mingdebug====>547 line,repy=>  Additional Requirements:

1. Product Comparison Tool:
* The system should have a product comparison tool that allows users to compare different products side-by-side based on their features, specifications, and prices.
* The product comparison tool should be visible on the website and allow administrators to customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product comparison tool's data sources and update them regularly.
1. Product Recommendation Algorithm:
* The system should have a product recommendation algorithm that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and preferences.
* The product recommendation algorithm should use machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and provide personalized recommendations.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product recommendation algorithm's settings and customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Product Bundling:
* The system should have a product bundling feature that allows users to purchase multiple products at a discounted price.
* The product bundling feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the available bundles and their prices.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product bundling feature for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Product Reviews:
* The system should have a product review feature that allows users to leave feedback about their purchases and experiences with the website.
* The product review feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the reviews and ratings for each product.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product review feature's display settings and trigger points (e.g., after a purchase, after a certain number of days).
Business analyst (to chat_manager):

 Additional Requirements:

1. Product Comparison Tool:
* The system should have a product comparison tool that allows users to compare different products side-by-side based on their features, specifications, and prices.
* The product comparison tool should be visible on the website and allow administrators to customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product comparison tool's data sources and update them regularly.
1. Product Recommendation Algorithm:
* The system should have a product recommendation algorithm that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and preferences.
* The product recommendation algorithm should use machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and provide personalized recommendations.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to manage the product recommendation algorithm's settings and customize it for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Product Bundling:
* The system should have a product bundling feature that allows users to purchase multiple products at a discounted price.
* The product bundling feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the available bundles and their prices.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product bundling feature for different categories or subcategories of products.
1. Product Reviews:
* The system should have a product review feature that allows users to leave feedback about their purchases and experiences with the website.
* The product review feature should be visible on the website and allow administrators to manage the reviews and ratings for each product.
* The system should have a feature that allows administrators to customize the product review feature's display settings and trigger points (e.g., after a purchase, after a certain number of days).
